account

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • account.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asset, Debt

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class representing a user's bank account.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int accountNum
      The unique account number.
      private ATM atm
      An instance of the ATM objectATM.
      (package private) double balance
      The dollar balance on the account.
      private java.util.Calendar dateCreated
      The date the account was created.
      private boolean isJoint
      Is true if the account is shared by 2 users and false if it has a sole owner.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> listOfTransactions
      A list of Transaction objects representing transactions performed through the account.
      private ReadAndWrite readAndWrite
      An instance of the ReadAndWrite class
      (package private) java.lang.String type
      The account type (i.e chequing, saving, credit card, loc, and stock).

    • Field Detail

      • type

        java.lang.String type
        The account type (i.e chequing, saving, credit card, loc, and stock).

      • accountNum

        private final int accountNum
        The unique account number.

      • balance

        double balance
        The dollar balance on the account.

      • listOfTransactions

        private final java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> listOfTransactions
        A list of Transaction objects representing transactions performed through the account. Deposits are not recorded in this list because they cannot be undone

      • dateCreated

        private final java.util.Calendar dateCreated
        The date the account was created.

      • atm

        private final ATM atm
        An instance of the ATM objectATM.

      • isJoint

        private boolean isJoint
        Is true if the account is shared by 2 users and false if it has a sole owner.

      • readAndWrite

        private final ReadAndWrite readAndWrite
        An instance of the ReadAndWrite class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        Account(int accountNum,
        ATM atm)
        Account constructor.
        Parameters:
        accountNum - assigns a unique account number to each account
        atm - an instance of the ATM

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Returns the balance of the account balance.
        Returns:
        the balance of the account

      • getIsJoint

        public boolean getIsJoint()
        Returns the joint status of the account isJoint.
        Returns:
        True if account is joint, False if it is not joint

      • getDateCreated

        public java.util.Calendar getDateCreated()
        Returns the date that the account was created.
        Returns:
        date when account was created

      • getListOfTransactions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getListOfTransactions()
        Returns the list of all transactions ever performed using the account listOfTransactions.
        Returns:
        listOfTransactions a list of Transaction objects

      • setIsJoint

        public void setIsJoint(boolean joined)
        Updates the joint status of an account isJoint.
        Parameters:
        joined - a boolean that is true when the account is joint and false otherwise

      • getLastTransaction

        public Transaction getLastTransaction()
        Returns the most recent transaction performed using the account.
        Returns:
        the last Transaction object in the listofTransactions for an account or null if no transactions have been performed yet

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the type of the account type.
        Returns:
        type a String that states the type of the account

      • getAccountNum

        public int getAccountNum()
        Returns the account number accountNum.
        Returns:
        accountNum a unique number assigned to each account

      • isPrimary

        public boolean isPrimary()
        Returns a boolean stating if an account is the primary account of a user.
        Returns:
        primaryStatus a boolean that is true if the account is the user's primary account and false otherwise

      • setPrimary

        public void setPrimary()
        Updates the primaryStatus of an account. A primary account can only be of type Chequing.

      • addMoney

        public abstract void addMoney(double amount)
        Adds money to the account and updates the balance according to the type of account. Balance of Asset accounts increases when money is added. Balance of Debt accounts decreases when money is added.
        Parameters:
        amount - dollar amount added into the account

      • removeMoney

        public abstract void removeMoney(double amount)
        Removes money from the account and updates the balance accordingly. Balance of Asset accounts decreases when money is removed. Balance of Debt accounts increases when money is removed.
        Parameters:
        amount - dollar amount removed from the account

      • checkFundsSufficient

        public boolean checkFundsSufficient(double amount)
        Checks if there is sufficient funds in an account.
        Parameters:
        amount - sufficient amount of funds needed
        Returns:
        a boolean, false if the account's balance is less than the amount we are checking for and true otherwise

      • transferIn

        public void transferIn(double amount,
                       Account accountFrom)
        Transfers money into the account from another account and prints the result of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        amount - the dollar amount being transferred
        accountFrom - the account the money is being transferred from

      • transferOut

        public void transferOut(double amount,
                        Account accountTo)
        Transfers money out of the account into another account and prints the result of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount being transferred
        accountTo - the account transferred to

      • deposit

        public void deposit()
        Deposits money into the account by reading the amount of money being deposited from deposit.txt using an instance of ReadAndWrite class and updates the transaction list of the account.
        See Also:
        ReadAndWrite

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraws money from the account if there is enough money in the account and the ATM has enough dollar bills to dispense.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount being withdrawn from the account

      • payBill

        public void payBill(double amount,
                    java.lang.String receiver)
        Pays a bill by transferring money from the account to an external account.

        Reads the details of the bill to be paid from outgoing.txt using an instance of the atm.ReadAndWrite class and if funds sufficient pays the bill.

        Parameters:
        amount - the bill amount
        receiver - the external account the money is being paid to

      • updateTransactionList

        private void updateTransactionList(Transaction transaction)
        Adds a Transaction to the end of the account's list of transactions.
        Parameters:
        transaction - a Transaction object

      • writeObject

        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Used to serialize an Account object.
        Parameters:
        oos - instance of the ObjectOutputStream class to write the account object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • readObject

        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Used to deserialize an Account object to estore the account's information after the ATM is rebooted.
        Parameters:
        ois - instance of the ObjectInputStream class used to read the account object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • readObjectNoData

        private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Used in serialization when class inheritance is not as expected*
        Throws:
        java.io.ObjectStreamException - when an attempt to deserialize a back-reference fails
